name: unoimalltht
text:
I think you're talking about his ability in Rise and Fall?

If so he grants a culture bomb when completing an industrial zone in any city, not just the one/two he was activated in.

There are a few other civs that get culture bombs as their abilities but it basically immediately adds all surrounding tiles to the respective city, so long as the tiles are within 3-tiles from the city-center.

This includes tiles from an opposing Civilization, but completed districts and wonders are immune (however in-progress wonders can be destroyed with a culture bomb, and there's actually an achievement tied to that).
